fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Research a player at night about their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The host will put their role name into https://www.thesaurus.com/ and pick the most fancy-sounding synonym on the page, which you will learn.
- If their role has multiple words, the root noun is chosen.
- If there is no page available, you will instead receive a sheriff result (suspicious/not suspicious).
*(Note - Synonyms for words aren't guaranteed to go both ways.)*
